title: dd
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: Defines the description value for a term in a description list

usageExamples.title: Example 1
usageExamples.description: Using dd tag to define description for a term
usageExamples.code:
<dl>
  <dt>Apple</dt>
  <dd> A fruit that is red or green in color.</dd>
</dl>

usageExamples.title: Example 2
usageExamples.description: Nested dd tags within a dl
usageExamples.code:
<dl>
  <dt>Apple</dt>
  <dd> A fruit that is red or green in color.</dd>
  <dt>Orange</dt>
  <dd> A fruit that is orange in color.</dd>
</dl>
